name: Health and Wellness
description: Nutrition workshops and exercise classes, awareness and prevention counseling, information and referrals and support for those living with Aids, HIV, Alzheimer's, diabetes, glaucoma prevention and those in recovery.
fullDescription: Nutrition workshops and exercise classes, awareness and prevention counseling, information and referrals and support for those living with Aids, HIV, Alzheimer's, diabetes, glaucoma prevention and those in recovery.
whatTheyOffer: Nutrition workshops and exercise classes, awareness and prevention counseling, information and referrals and support for those living with Aids, HIV, Alzheimer's, diabetes, glaucoma prevention and those in recovery.
howToGetIt: Call or email TCDC for more information about their programs and services.
